about-us-content: We, at Bronix aim to offer a fully independent self-managed, stable, efficient, fair and transparent investment solution. Bronix uses the underlying Blockchain technology and Peer to Peer network architecture to incorporate the much desired financial security and income stability in the current unstable market scenario.Bronix offers an alternate non-government self-regulated and independent cryptocurrency investment platform ensuring the highest degree of digital data confidentiality, security, transparency and easy interface for money transfers. The money can be transferred in real time irrespective of time and place across the globe.Bronix has a clear vision and well-defined strategy to achieve the same.Our propensity to excel by providing financial freedom and stability in the current fluctuating economy helps us to stand invincible in the current scenario. Backed by distributed ledger technologies and world’s best technical team, Bronix is all set to create a benchmark in the cryptocurrency market.Be a part of our Family and unfold the opportunities for next-generation investment solutions with us!!
termsP1: The BRONIX tokens are not intended to constitute securities in any jurisdiction. The Whitepaper does not constitute a prospectus or offer document of any sort and is not intended to constitute an offer of securities or a solicitation for investment in securities in any jurisdiction.
termsP2: No person is bound to enter into any contract or binding legal commitment in relation to the sale and purchase of the BRONIX tokens and no cryptocurrency or other form of payment is to be accepted based on this Whitepaper.
termsP3: Bronix does not guarantee, and accepts no legal liability whatsoever arising from or connected to, the accuracy, reliability, currency, or completeness of any material contained in the whitepaper. Bronix token buyers should seek appropriate independent professional advice prior to relying on, or entering into any commitment or transaction based on, material published in the whitepaper, which material is purely published for reference purposes alone.
termsP4: Bronix does not provide any opinion on any advice to purchase, sell, or otherwise transact with Bronix tokens and the fact of presentation of this white paper shall not form the basis of, or be relied upon relating to, any contract or investment decision.
termsP5: No regulatory authority has examined or approved of any of the information set out in this Whitepaper. No such action has been or will be taken under the laws, regulatory requirements or rules of any jurisdiction. The publication, distribution or dissemination of this Whitepaper does not imply that the applicable laws, regulatory requirements or rules have been complied with.
termsP6: This Whitepaper, any part thereof and any copy thereof must not be taken or transmitted to any country where distribution or dissemination of this Whitepaper is prohibited or restricted.
restrictionsP1: You must not purchase any BRONIX tokens if you are a citizen or resident of The United States/Resident of America, Canada, China, and Taiwan or any other country with existing regulations in their respective states, or associated with any jurisdiction where distribution or dissemination of these Terms, or participation in this token sale, is prohibited or restricted.
restrictionsP2: In no event shall Bronix, members of Bronix staff, contractors, or volunteers be liable for
restrictionsLi1: Any lost profits, lost savings or incidental, indirect, special or consequential damages, arising out of your use or inability to use the services or products offered by Bronix or the breach of any of these Terms by any third party;
restrictionsLi2: Any security risk such as hacker attacks, loss of password, loss of private key, or similar.
restrictionsLi3: Mistakes or errors in code, text, or images involved in the sale.
restrictionsLi4: Any losses resulting from the volatility in pricing of Bronix’s in any countries and cryptocurrency exchanges.
restrictionsLi5: This website and the BRONIX tokens are provided on an 'as is' basis and without any warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied. You assume all responsibility and risk with respect to your use of the website and purchasing of any amount of the BRONIX tokens and their use. If applicable law does not allow all or any part of the above limitation of liability to apply to you, the limitations will apply to you only to the extent permitted by applicable law.
restrictionsLi6: By acquiring Bronix’s Token and to the extent permitted by applicable law, the buyer agrees not to hold Bronix’s Token or any employee or contractor of Bronix liable for any losses or damages arising out of or in any way connected to the buyer’s failure to properly secure the private key to the wallet containing their Bronixs: hacker’s attacks, stolen devices, loss of passwords, etc.
noAdviceP1: No information in Bronix whitepaper should be considered to be business, legal, and financial or tax advice regarding Bronix, the Distributor, the BRONIX tokens, the Bronix Token Sale, the Bronix Wallet, and the Bronix Exchange (each as referred to in the Whitepaper). You should consult your own legal, financial, tax or other professional adviser regarding Bronix and/or the Distributor and their respective businesses and operations, the BRONIX tokens, the Bronix Token Sale, the Bronix Wallet, and the Bronix Exchange (each as referred to in the Whitepaper). You should be aware that you may be required to bear the financial risk of any purchase of BRONIX tokens for an indefinite period of time.
noRepresentationContent: Bronix and/or the Distributor does not make or purport to make, and hereby disclaims, any representation, warranty or undertaking in any form whatsoever to any entity or person, including any representation, warranty or undertaking in relation to the truth, accuracy and completeness of any of the information set out in this Whitepaper.
representationByYouP1: By accessing and/or accepting possession of any information in Bronix Whitepaper or such part thereof (as the case may be), you represent and warrant to Bronix, as follows:
representationByYouLi1: You agree and acknowledge that the BRONIX tokens do not constitute securities in any form in any jurisdiction;
representationByYouLi2: You agree and acknowledge that this Whitepaper does not constitute a prospectus or offer document of any sort and is not intended to constitute an offer of securities in any jurisdiction or a solicitation for investment in securities and you are not bound to enter into any contract or binding legal commitment and no cryptocurrency or another form of payment is to be accepted on the basis of this Whitepaper;
representationByYouLi3: You agree and acknowledge that no regulatory authority has examined or approved of the information set out in this.
technicalRisksContent: This BRONIX Token Distribution Contract is contingent on the Ethereum blockchain; therefore, you need to be aware of certain things.
blockProductionMayOccurAtRandomTimes: Block Production may occur at Random Times
blockProductionContent: On the Ethereum blockchain, block production may occur at random times as timing is determined by the proof of work. Your transaction may not be included in the ethereum blockchain at the time you expect it to be. In such a case you may not receive the BRONIX tokens the same day you sent the ethereum.
riskOfAbandonment: Risk of abandonment / lack of success
riskOfAbandonmentContent: You understand and accept that the creation of the BRONIX tokens and the development of the BRONIX platform may be abandoned for several reasons, including lack of interest from the public, lack of funding, lack of commercial success or prospects (e.g. caused by competing projects). You therefore understand that there is no assurance that, even if the BRONIX platform is partially or fully developed and launched, you will receive any benefits through the BRONIX tokens held by you.
riskAssociatedWithOtherApplicationsConte: You understand and accept that the BRONIX platform and products may give rise to other, alternative projects, promoted by unaffiliated third parties, under which BRONIX will have no intrinsic value.
networkCongestionContent: The Ethereum network is liable to face congestion at times, due to which the transactions can be delayed or even lost. Please note that this is a limitation of the ethereum blockchain and not the BRONIX contract.
sendEtherOnlyWithAnAccountYouFullyOwn: Send Ether only with an account you fully own
sendEtherContent: The BRONIX token will be sent to the same account you used to send the funds (Ether). If you send the ETH from an exchange or an account you do not control, you may not be able to claim your BRONIX Tokens.
losingThePrivateKey: Losing the private key / Ether wallet
losingThePrivateKeyContent: If you lose the private key or the password of the Ether wallet where you can hold your BRONIX tokens, you will not have access to these BRONIX tokens and may lose them forever.
riskOfTheftContent: You understand and accept that the underlying software application and software platform (i.e. the Ethereum blockchain) may be exposed to attacks by hackers or other individuals that that could result in theft or loss of BRONIX tokens or ETH, impacting the ability to develop the BRONIX platform.
riskOfEthereumMiningAttacksContent: You understand and accept that, as with other cryptocurrencies, the blockchain used for the BRONIX tokens is susceptible to mining attacks, including but not limited to double‐spend attacks, majority mining power attacks, 'selfish‐mining' attacks, and race condition attacks.
